name: AutoScript AI
description:
AutoScript AI is an intelligent test automation assistant that converts any website URL into structured, production-ready automation test scripts using the power of AI.

Designed for QA engineers, SDETs, and developers, the app analyzes web pages, identifies key UI elements and user flows, and automatically generates high-quality automation code following industry best practices.

With just a URL as input, AutoScript AI delivers:

Detailed test scenarios (positive, negative, and edge cases)

Clean automation scripts using Selenium and TestNG

Page Object Model (POM) based architecture

Reliable selectors and explicit waits

Well-commented, readable, and reusable code

Whether you are preparing for interviews, building automation frameworks, or accelerating real-world testing, AutoScript AI helps you save time and focus on quality instead of repetitive scripting.

Key Features

URL-based automation script generation

AI-driven UI analysis

Industry-standard frameworks and patterns

Production-ready and interview-level code

Easy to understand and customizable output

Powered by: Google Gemini
Owner & Creator: Sankalp Suman
